name: Roc Juvenile

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roc attacks once with its beak and once with its talons  or makes a beak attack and drops a grappled creature or held object.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit  reach 10 ft.  one target. Hit: 16 (3d6+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 16 (3d6+6) slashing damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained  and the roc can't attack a different target with its talons.

reactions.name: Retributive Strike
reactions.desc: When a creature the roc can see hits it with a melee weapon attack, the roc makes a beak attack against its attacker.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: The roc has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
